user_instruction: 'Send an update to the Academic Alliance (academicalliance@university.edu) about our next study session. You can check out my Gmail and Jane'"'"'s Genius Planner for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["academicalliance@university.edu"],"subject":"Update: Next Study Session – Monday, 21 Feb","body":"Hello Academic Alliance Team,

I hope you’re all doing well! Here’s a quick update on our upcoming study session:

Date: Monday, 21 February
Time: 3:00 PM – 5:00 PM
Location: Library Study Room 204 (our usual spot)

Proposed agenda:
1. Brief review of last week’s topics
2. Discussion of new material (Chapters 4 & 5)
3. Group exercises on statistical methods
4. Preparation for the upcoming mid-term exam
5. Open Q&A and next steps

Please come prepared with any questions or specific topics you’d like to cover. If the revised time causes any conflicts, let me know and we’ll try to accommodate.

Looking forward to a productive session together!

Best regards,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: Your update has been sent to the Academic Alliance.
